script:
import sys
from awsglue.transforms import *
from awsglue.utils import getResolvedOptions
from pyspark.context import SparkContext
from awsglue.context import GlueContext
from awsglue.job import Job
import re

args = getResolvedOptions(sys.argv, ['JOB_NAME', 'snapshot_month'])
SNAPSHOT_MONTH = args['snapshot_month']

sc = SparkContext()
glueContext = GlueContext(sc)
spark = glueContext.spark_session
job = Job(glueContext)
job.init(args['JOB_NAME'], args)

nz_migration_source_node1770000559065 = glueContext.create_dynamic_frame.from_catalog(
    database="nz_migration",
    table_name="raw_stats_nz_international_migration",
    transformation_ctx="nz_migration_source_node1770000559065"
)

nz_migration_snapshot_filter = Filter.apply(
    frame=nz_migration_source_node1770000559065,
    f=lambda row: row["snapshot_month"] == SNAPSHOT_MONTH
)

nz_migration_filter_node1770000725150 = Filter.apply(
    frame=nz_migration_snapshot_filter,
    f=lambda row: (
        bool(re.match("Arrivals", row["direction"])) and
        bool(re.match("Long-term migrant", row["passenger_type"]))
    ),
    transformation_ctx="nz_migration_filter_node1770000725150"
)

nz_migration_target_node1770000880432 = glueContext.getSink(
    path="s3://nz-migration-data-yangli/curated/migration_arrivals_facts/Arrivals/Long-term/",
    connection_type="s3",
    updateBehavior="UPDATE_IN_DATABASE",
    partitionKeys=["year_month"],
    enableUpdateCatalog=True,
    transformation_ctx="nz_migration_target_node1770000880432"
)
nz_migration_target_node1770000880432.setCatalogInfo(
    catalogDatabase="nz_migration",
    catalogTableName="migration_arrivals_monthly"
)
nz_migration_target_node1770000880432.setFormat("glueparquet", compression="snappy")
nz_migration_target_node1770000880432.writeFrame(nz_migration_filter_node1770000725150)

job.commit()
